recipesJson.name: MILF SHAKE
recipesJson.author: MixandHope
recipesJson.description: This is the best berry combo I have ever tasted, being that I love milkshakes and smoothies I had to make one. This is the Berry Trinity, the Holy Grail of a berry combo for me. If you got the flavors, mix this up and give me your thoughts. The milkshake base and shisha vanilla really thicken up the ice cream. The cream cheese icing adds to the mix a perfect milkshake. I am using Hussar Legacy on a Drone 250C,  55watts @ 0.15ohm
